resources.string: In the sixth tutorial you learn how to use bombs.
This is the sixth tutorial. Here you will learn how to use bombs to destroy walls or to harm enemies.
Now reach the flag to finish this tutorial

Open the weapons menu with [colour='FFFFFFFF'][image='input_buttons/menu'][colour='FF000000'] and select the bomb with [colour='FFFFFFFF'][image='input_buttons/left'][image='input_buttons/right][colour='FF000000']. To close the menu press again [colour='FFFFFFFF'][image='input_buttons/menu'][colour='FF000000'].
Now plant a bomb next to the damaged bricks. Press [colour='FFFFFFFF'][image='input_buttons/attack'][colour='FF000000'] to place the bomb in front of you, hold the button to throw the bomb.
